View on GitHub

SL2017

The SL2017 Danish National Scout Jamboree App Suite

The voice-call in’s are not public and transmitted as scrambled values. From their smartphones caretakers are able to give voice-call in’s by simply press a button. The display has room for a few important voice-call in’s so instead of dialing a number, trying to wake someone up on a walkie-talkie and what not, a caretaker simply presses a button, say the ‘Serious Ill Person’ button, and the software will keep calling nurses on watch until someone answers the call and then the call is routed to the caretaker for immediate action.

SL2017 maintained by sl2017

Published with GitHub Pages
